effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

short_effect.black_white: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

flavor_text.black_white: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.
